text: "Sowing Season", also named "Sowing Season (Yeah)", is a song by Brand New. Brand New is an American rock band. The song was released as a single in November 2006. It is on the band's third album, The Devil and God Are Raging Inside Me. Two different versions of the song have been released. A demo version of the song was put on the internet in January 2006. This version was not released by the band. In 2015, Brand New released the demo on the album Leaked Demos 2006. The demo was changed into a new song. It was named "Sowing Season". It was the first song on The Devil and God Are Raging Inside Me (2006). == Track listing == == References == Category:2006 songs
title: Sowing Season
